warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Extend arms to the sides and make small circles, gradually increasing the size. Perform 2 sets of 30 seconds each direction.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Alternate between arching your back (cat) and dropping your belly (cow). Perform 2 sets of 10 reps.
Swing arms forward and backward in a controlled manner. Perform 2 sets of 30 seconds.

exercises.setup: Sit down at a lat pull-down machine and adjust the knee pad to fit snugly against your thighs.
execution: Grip the bar with a wide grip, palms facing forward.
Pull the bar down to your upper chest while keeping your back straight.
Engage your lats and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Slowly return to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
exercises.weight: Select a weight where the last 2-3 reps feel challenging but still allow you to maintain proper form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at the lat pull-down machine with a neutral grip attachment.
alternative_exercise_execution: Grip the attachment with palms facing each other.
Pull the bar down to your upper chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on engaging your lats throughout the movement and avoid using momentum.

exercises.exercise_name: Half Kneeling One Arm Lat Pull Down
exercises.setup: Kneel on one knee and brace against a bench or your knee for stability.
execution: Grip the cable handle with one hand.
Pull the cable down by driving your elbow down and back.
Focus on engaging your lat and keeping your torso stable.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Use a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps per arm with good form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at a cable row machine with feet braced against the platform.
alternative_exercise_execution: Grip the handle with both hands.
Pull the handle towards your torso, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to complete 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Maintain a stable core and avoid twisting your torso during the pull.

exercises.setup: Use a preacher bench to angle your upper arm.
execution: Grip the bar with an underhand grip, arms fully extended.
Curl the bar towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
Slowly lower the bar back to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps with good form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Set up the cable at hand height, face away, and take one or two steps forward.
alternative_exercise_execution: Grip the cable handle with both hands.
Curl the handle towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows stationary.
Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to complete 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on keeping your elbows locked in place to maximize biceps engagement.

exercises.setup: Set up the cable at hand height, face away, and take one or two steps forward.
execution: Grip the cable handle with both hands.
Curl the handle towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows stationary.
Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Use a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps with good form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit on an incline bench with dumbbells in each hand.
alternative_exercise_execution: Let your arms hang down fully extended.
Curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows stationary.
Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Ensure a full range of motion to maximize the stretch and contraction of the biceps.
